title: Gromit and The Battle For Duck Island: The First Book in The Duck Island Series
description: Gromit the gnome sits down with his friend for a picnic only to notice something someone had taken his crackers! He ends up following a group of ducks to a place called Duck Island in search of his crackers. But little does Gromit know, soon the crackers will be the least of his worries.
author: Wyatt Corallini
